On this site you can find my statistics lectures for SSR.

```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
files <- list.files("lectures", full.names = F, pattern = "\\.qmd", recursive = F)

lectures = data.frame()
n = length(files)

for (i in 1:n) {

  lectures[i ,'url'] <- data.frame(url = paste0("lectures/", files[i]))
  
  yaml <- rmarkdown::yaml_front_matter(lectures[i ,'url'])
  
  lectures[i , 'title'] = yaml$title
  lectures[i , 'date'] = yaml$date
  lectures[i , 'file_name'] = files[i]

}

data.frame(Date    = lectures$date, 
           Lecture = lectures$title,
           Handout = sprintf("[link](%s)", lectures$url),
           Slides  = sprintf('[link](../lectures/%s){.external target="_blank"}',
                             gsub("qmd", "html", files[i]))
           )
```
